SELECT p.id, p.payment_method AS paymentmethod, p.payment_history AS paymenthistory, p.amount, p.paid_at AS paidat, o.office_name AS storeLocation, p.pay_code AS paycode FROM pay p JOIN office o ON p.office_id = o.id ORDER BY p.paid_at
ASC DESC

SELECT p.id, p.payment_method AS paymentmethod, p.payment_history AS paymenthistory, p.amount, p.paid_at AS paidat, o.office_name AS storeLocation, p.pay_code AS paycode FROM pay p JOIN office o ON p.office_id = o.id WHERE DATE(p.paid_at) BETWEEN #{fromDate} AND #{toDate} ORDER BY p.paid_at
ASC DESC
